title: mRemoteNG frequently freezes when opening and closing Options
author: igor2x
body_snippet:
On mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3220:

1. File | Options and just click on OK button at the bottom.
2. Double click to open SSH session.
3. Close down connection and Yes button to confirm.
4. File | Options and problem appears. No options are displayed, only blank sheet.
5. Closing down empty Options and General panel and mRemoteNG freezes for some time.
6. Double click to open SSH session and close down the session.
7. File | Options and nothing happens.

Plenty of bugs... it looks AI is writing a lot o...

comments.snippet: AI helpfull but not always right :) I do review what it suggest but sometimes its trigger something new what is not always visible so I am glad you helping me with testing, will try to test it better but code base is complex sometimes its hard to predict what it will trigger...
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet: I assume this fix is included in mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3221 because NB was released few hours after this commit. I have retested with NB-3221 and the same issue appears after step 4 and mRemoteNG freeze. Can you please reopen the issue.
comments.author: igor2x

comments.snippet: Acept invite in github you will have rights
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.78.*
comments.author: robertpopa22
